Posts.Content: does anyone have any ideas howi can get some financial help while i am going through chemo? i can not get ss dist. from the goverment because i did not work the year before i was disabled. i have had three different surgeries in the last 17 months, but they do not consider me disabled until i had my chem., which i still am going through. i have an aggressive cancer and they are treated me with an aggressive chem regament. i have a beautiful 10 year old son i need to surrport. please help us with answers.  thank you,  sue
Posts.Title: how to i find financial help
